data.title: Michael J. McNally
data.meta_description: Meet Colorado Attorney Michael J. McNally at the Law Firm of Thomas N. Scheffel & Associates, P.C. Contact us today for representation.
data.text:
Michael J. McNally was born on November 6, 1961. He is licensed in Colorado (state and federal court) and Arizona. His areas of practice over the last thirty years include medical and hospital malpractice, mental health professional liability and administrative law, probate litigation, personal injury, employment, products liability, insurance bad faith, and general litigation. Mr. McNally has been a speaker at numerous national and local meetings and education programs on a broad range of topics including risk management and automotive products liability.

Mr. McNally’s admissions to the bar include Colorado (1986); U.S. District Court (1986); the Tenth Circuit Court of Appeals (2010); and Arizona (2011). Mr. McNally has handled cases in state and federal courts in Colorado, California, Texas, Alabama, Arizona, New Mexico, Georgia, Florida, Oklahoma, Ohio, and Iowa. He was a board member of the Colorado Trial Lawyers Association. He is also a member of the Colorado Bar Association.

He attended the University of Colorado where he obtained a B.A. in 1983, graduating with academic honors, Phi Beta Kappa. Mr. McNally obtained his J.D. degree in 1986 from the University of Denver College of Law. He was the recipient of the American Jurisprudence Award in Conflict of Laws. He enjoys the highest rating, “AV for preeminence and excellence in the practice of law,” granted by Martindale-Hubbell.

He was chosen by his peers as a “Super Lawyer” in 5280 Magazine’s Colorado’s Top Lawyers edition for the years 2008 and 2009.
